meanings.definition: Capable of being arranged in a particular sequence.
meanings.sent1: The colorful blocks are orderable by size.
meanings.sent2: The numbers on the clock are orderable from one to twelve.
meanings.sent3: The orderable books on the shelf made the librarian smile.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like orderable puzzle pieces, fitting perfectly together.
meanings.sent5: The alphabet blocks made learning letters orderable and fun.

meanings.definition: Able to be purchased or requested.
meanings.sent1: The new toy was orderable online.
meanings.sent2: The orderable items in the catalog arrived quickly.
meanings.sent3: She found the idea of orderable cupcakes very tempting.
meanings.sent4: His happiness was orderable with just a click of a button.
meanings.sent5: The orderable dress was perfect for the special occasion.

meanings.definition: Suitable for being put in order or organized.
meanings.sent1: The orderable files made the task easier.
meanings.sent2: Her desk was always neat and orderable.
meanings.sent3: The orderable schedule helped him stay on track.
meanings.sent4: The chaos of the room became orderable with her touch.
meanings.sent5: The orderable list of chores made the day productive.
